document.heading: Crispus Attucks Development Corporation Real Property Tax Exemption and Equitable Real Property Tax Relief Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-142, the “Crispus Attucks Development Corporation Real Property Tax Exemption and Equitable Real Property Tax Relief Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-68, which was referred to Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 6, 2004, and February 3, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 19, 2004, it was assigned Act No. 15-363 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-142 became effective on April 22, 2004.
